info: This project arises from the need to provide programming students who are about to enter the workforce with the minimum foundations to prepare for a job interview in technical skills, logical skills, and life skills. Collaborative project.

Development of a web application called 'Riwi Jobs' using JSON Server as a fake backend and Vanilla JavaScript for the frontend. The application will have four main views: a public one to list job positions, one for login, one for company registration, and another for vacancy management per company.
